ej,mansd801,C,fichm901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,nippa001,C,fichm901,Bench-clearing brawl ej,sweem002,P,fichm901,Bench-clearing brawl $Mike Sweeney asked HP umpire Mike Fichter to have pitcher Jeff Weaver move the resin bag; Weaver swore at him so Sweeney threw his helmet at Weaver and charged mound, throwing Weaver to the ground; a bench-clearing brawl followed; Sweeney, Royals' pitching coach Al Nipper & Tigers bench coach Doug Mansolino all ejected by Fichter after 12 minute delay; Sweeney was suspended for 10 games, Tigers catcher Robert Fick for 8 games, Nipper for 3 games, Tigers bench coach Bill Madlock for 2 games & Tigers 1B coach Juan Samuel for 1 game; fined were Magee, Weaver, Mayne and Tigers bullpen coach Ed Ott
